attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the death of Baby P...tortured and killed. It has become clear that the public bodies put in place to serve society are failing and are not fit for purpose.

The prime-minister should up-hold his duty and do something about the increasingly impotent and bureaucratic state of these bodies.....there needs to be a reveolution in the public sector. Too many cowards are incompetent of deaing with this....is Gordon Brown one of them?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
